spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent overall room layout and adjacency. Scaling is preserved for the main floor plate. Minor penalty for the orientation of several doors which appear as simple gaps or brown blocks rather than indicating swing direction as per the layout. Window placements are largely accurate.

structural_fidelity.notes: Perfect adherence to structural constraints. No missing rooms, no text/labels, floating model on a dark background, and a clean cutaway view.

furniture_mapping.notes: Very high accuracy in furniture placement including living room sofas, dining sets, and beds. Minor deduction for the kitchen area where the island is correct but the secondary seating/stools from the plan are omitted.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style. The camera is slightly closer to a top-down perspective than a true 45-degree isometric, but orthographic projection is maintained.

detected_errors.description: Missing stools/seats at the kitchen island.
Door swing indications are replaced by static blocks, losing the orientation detail of the original plan.
